name: dalle3-image-generator
description: Flask application that uses OpenAI's DALL-E model to generate images based on a user's input.

name: aiDataAssistant
description: AI-powered assistant for data science tasks, built with Python, Streamlit, and OpenAI's GPT-3. The assistant can help with exploratory data analysis (EDA), feature engineering, and machine learning model selection.

name: Naive Bayes Spam Email Classifier
description: This project is a Naive Bayes Spam Email Classifier. It uses the Naive Bayes algorithm to classify emails as either spam or not spam.

name: Chatbot using Ollama LLM
description: Local Chatbot using OLLAMA Model LLM
